abstract: President Obama’s nominee to lead the World Bank, Jim Yong Kim, is the president of Dartmouth College and a global health expert. But did you know he was also a skilled rapper (and singer)?
snippet: President Obama’s nominee to lead the World Bank, Jim Yong Kim, is the president of Dartmouth College and a global health expert. But did you know he was also a skilled rapper (and singer)?
lead_paragraph: As my colleague Annie Lowrey reported, the Obama administration announced its nomination for the next World Bank president: Jim Yong Kim.

headline.main: World Bank Nominee … and Rap Star
